content:
# The inspection shows that after inserting the resources, the Stone Furnace is still reporting "NO FUEL," despite having 27 units of Coal available. 
# It appears that the furnace is not recognizing the Coal as a fuel source, which may be due to a data issue or a problem with the insertion process.

# The furnace has 9 units of Iron Ore remaining, but it is not currently smelting due to the fuel status.

# To troubleshoot this, I will try inserting an additional 5 units of Coal into the Stone Furnace to see if it resolves the fuel issue.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=5)  # Inserting 5 more units of Coal into the furnace.

# After this insertion, I will check the status of the Stone Furnace again to see if it has resumed operation.
current_status = stone_furnace_entity.status  # Get the current status of the Stone Furnace.
print(f"Current status of the Stone Furnace after adding more Coal: {current_status}")  # Print the current status after the action.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Checking the state of entities after the action.
